body_html:
The libcupti.dylib file is in the CUDA extras folder (e.g., /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/extras/CUPTI/lib/libcupti.8.0.dylib).

I created a symbolic link from /usr/local/cuda/lib with

sudo ln -s /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/extras/CUPTI/lib/libcupti.8.0.dylib libcupti.dylib
body_text:
The libcupti.dylib file is in the CUDA extras folder (e.g., /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/extras/CUPTI/lib/libcupti.8.0.dylib).
I created a symbolic link from /usr/local/cuda/lib with
sudo ln -s /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/extras/CUPTI/lib/libcupti.8.0.dylib libcupti.dylib
body:
The libcupti.dylib file is in the CUDA extras folder (e.g., /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/extras/CUPTI/lib/libcupti.8.0.dylib).  

I created a symbolic link from /usr/local/cuda/lib with 

    sudo ln -s /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/extras/CUPTI/lib/libcupti.8.0.dylib libcupti.dylib
